title: Part One: Mike Adams: The Deadliest Fake News Icon You've Never Heard Of
itunes:title: Part One: Mike Adams: The Deadliest Fake News Icon You've Never Heard Of
description:
In Episode 69, Robert is joined by Dan and Jordan from Knowledge Fight Podcast to discuss how Mike Adams got rich spreading death and paranoia online.
